description: The modern link-in-bio solution for creators and businesses.
resetMessage: If your account exists, you will receive an email to reset your password.
title: Title
linkRequired: At least one link is required.
profileReady: Your profile is ready. You can always edit it in the dashboard.
heroDescription: linkulike is your digital business card for all your channels. Share one link and keep your community up to date!
communityTitle:
KEEP YOUR COMMUNITY
UP TO DATE
WITH LINKULIKE
communityText1: On Instagram, TikTok or Twitter – many platforms limit you to just one link in your bio.
communityText2: linkulike is your central landing page where you can find all your clickable links in one place. This increases traffic to all your channels so your followers never miss your content.
brandsText: These brands already use linkulike, together with over 25,000 influencers, artists and entrepreneurs. Join the community.
privacyText1: linkulike is a GDPR-compliant alternative to Linktree & Co.
privacyText2: We do not use user tracking or tracking cookies and rely exclusively on servers in Germany. This makes linkulike a 100% GDPR-compliant alternative to all link-in-bio providers that force you to pay with your data. You can use linkulike for advertising purposes in your bio on Instagram and TikTok with a clear conscience.
businessTitle:
DO YOU USE INSTAGRAM
FOR YOUR BUSINESS?
businessText1: Every commercial social media profile must comply with legal requirements.
businessText2: If you use social media for your business, you are required to provide an imprint, terms and conditions, privacy policy or terms of use. You can add all legal documents to your linkulike with just one click. Our service gives you free access to a privacy policy worth €7 per month.
ctaTitle:
CREATE YOUR OWN LINKULIKE
IN JUST A FEW MINUTES
ctaStep1:
Choose your linkulike name
and get started.
ctaStep2: Add as many links as you want. Fast and easy.
ctaStep3:
Choose a color, upload your
profile picture and you're done.
footerClaim: The GDPR-compliant link-in-bio solution for creators and businesses.
enterUsername: Enter a username to see your biolink preview
featuresDescription: Powerful features designed to help you create stunning bio link pages and grow your online presence.
featureThemeDesc: Choose from dozens of stunning themes or create your own custom design with our intuitive editor.
featureAnalyticsDesc: Track clicks, views, and engagement with detailed analytics to understand what works best.
featureMobileDesc: Perfect on every device. Your bio link page looks great on phones, tablets, and desktops.
featureFastDesc: Built with modern technology for instant loading and smooth performance worldwide.
featureDomainsDesc: Get a free subdomain like yourname.linkulike.com. Perfect for branding and easy to remember.
featureSocialDesc: Connect all your social media profiles with beautiful icons and seamless integration.
pricingDesc: Start free, upgrade when you need more features.
ctaText: Join thousands of creators who are already using linkulike to grow their online presence.
loginSubtitle: Sign in to your linkulike account
registerSubtitle: Join thousands of creators on linkulike
dashboardSubtitle: Manage your bio links and customize your profile
pageNotFoundDesc: Sorry, we couldn't find the page you're looking for.
sampleLinksNotice: The links below are just examples. Add your own links in the dashboard!
changeUsernameDescription: After changing, all old links will no longer work. You can only change your username every 30 days.
usernameChangeBlocked: You can change your username again on {date}.
existingImageLoadFailed: Existing image could not be loaded
title: Title
themeAppearanceSubtitle: Customize the appearance of your profile
